title: Zapitrinantopik
author: Zapitrinantopik
content: SERVICES - PRICES - LIMITED TIMELISTINGSJeet listings(%80 guarenteed)need liquidty an volume)(+1k for pre listings)CoinMarketCap Listing $3,500 CoinGecko Listing $2,500CoinMarketCap insider way (Guarenteed)$12,000TRENDINGSCoinMarketCapTop 1 $17,000 5M volumeTop 3 $11,000 1M volumeTop 6 $8,000 1M volumeMost visited CoinGeckoUSA/UK/INDIA 5 Days $1,500Search bar trending $1,500Dextools24hours $10,000(Discount available for bulk orders.) 300k volumeListing on CEX’es,Bilboards,Marketing advice also available.Interested? Contact @Mootico

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Zapitrinantopik on July 12, 2023, 11:28:35 AMSERVICES - PRICES - LIMITED TIMELISTINGSJeet listings(%80 guarenteed)need liquidty an volume)(+1k for pre listings)CoinMarketCap Listing $3,500 CoinGecko Listing $2,500CoinMarketCap insider way (Guarenteed)$12,000TRENDINGSCoinMarketCapTop 1 $17,000 5M volumeTop 3 $11,000 1M volumeTop 6 $8,000 1M volumeYou forgot to mention that you are going to use an escrow and it should come from this forum if you're not going to use an escrow then people will have doubts about your offer and besides its been stated here so many times that both Coingecko and Coinmarketcap do not ask for a listing fee and yet you are here offering listing in exchange for fees and it's a big amount, you really think that you can fool people.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP is really not serious  from the looks. These two organizations as mentioned by OP does not demand for fee for listing  but OP does and I ask OP if he or she is the head listing director of the organizations and I see fees demanded are for express listings.No portfolio, nobody to vouch for OP, no escrow, no reputation, no nothing and you want projects from here to contact you for listings very funny though. Please do not waste your time in this pursuit of yours here because you barely can get anybody here to do this without an escrow from this platform.

These two organizations as mentioned by OP does not demand for fee for listing  but OP does and I ask OP if he or she is the head listing director of the organizations and I see fees demanded are for express listings.No portfolio, nobody to vouch for OP, no escrow, no reputation, no nothing and you want projects from here to contact you for listings very funny though. Please do not waste your time in this pursuit of yours here because you barely can get anybody here to do this without an escrow from this platform.Quote from: CryptSafe on July 12, 2023, 04:30:51 PMOP is really not serious  from the looks. These two organizations as mentioned by OP does not demand for fee for listing  but OP does and I ask OP if he or she is the head listing director of the organizations and I see fees demanded are for express listings.No portfolio, nobody to vouch for OP, no escrow, no reputation, no nothing and you want projects from here to contact you for listings very funny though. Please do not waste your time in this pursuit of yours here because you barely can get anybody here to do this without an escrow from this platform.Yes of course we can use Escrow and of course you are right lemme explainListing on CMC & CG is 100% free. It’s the truth. However, we’re here to help assist with the application because applying requires more than just saying statements. You have to be professional and cohesive in your application. Hence why we help and provide our services. It helps your application have a higher chance at succeeding.We will vet your project and collect some information from you to ensure that you are in the best possible position for a successful listing.We can even offer to fast track your application too. We cannot gurantee a 100% successful listing but our success ratio sure is very high. And You guys on CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko yet? Or looking for a listing? (Takes on average 1-3 days per listing)I do accept your coin as payment!* I also offer a legal agreement if service isn’t provided you can take legal action. *How it works:We have connection in CMC. They can't bypass the typical listing requirements, but the service we provide is an expedited application and resubmission to get in front of a listing manager instead of  waiting in the queue like all the other tokens. When tokens apply they get sent to the back of the queue and then they're at the mercy of the normal wait time. If you are missing information or if it's denied you won't know until you've waited all that time and then you start the process again..The quickest we've listed with this connect is about 2 hours, average being 2-3 days, of course there are some outliers (depending on the performance of the token; usual "dead" tokens wait longer)

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Zapitrinantopik on July 12, 2023, 05:10:38 PMHow it works:We have connection in CMC. They can't bypass the typical listing requirements, but the service we provide is an expedited application and resubmission to get in front of a listing manager instead of  waiting in the queue like all the other tokens. When tokens apply they get sent to the back of the queue and then they're at the mercy of the normal wait time. If you are missing information or if it's denied you won't know until you've waited all that time and then you start the process again..The quickest we've listed with this connect is about 2 hours, average being 2-3 days, of course there are some outliers (depending on the performance of the token; usual "dead" tokens wait longer)Are you implying that there are corrupt people on Coingecko and Coinmarketcap, they have issued a strong warning to people asking for fees to get listed QuoteCoinMarketCap listings (i.e. creation of a CMC page) are always free. Please beware of spoofed emails, fake social accounts, or individuals requesting listing fees. Anyone asking you to pay a fee or tip for getting your project listed on CoinMarketCap is definitely not sanctioned to do so. We also do not sanction any listing service to assist in the listing application of any cryptoasset project or exchange. While we gladly accept donations, attempting to bribe us in the hopes of influencing the outcome of your request will not work. CoinMarketCap reserves the right to exercise its sole discretion to blacklist any project that pays for listings services or attempts to bribe CMC employees.https://support.coinmarketcap.com/hc/en-us/articles/360043659351-Listings-CriteriaAnd You never mentioned escrowing and that escrowing should be done by a reputable escrow here in Bitcointalk and not anywhere else if you cannot offer this then your offer is fake and people should be careful about your service.
